apps.name: Alexa Pack Manager
apps.description: Manager app that creates Alexa-friendly trigger devices and MultiTrigger groups.

drivers.name: Alexa Pack – Virtual Contact Trigger
drivers.description: Virtual contact sensor optimized for Alexa routines, with auto-reset, debouncing, and diagnostics.

drivers.name: Alexa Pack – Endpoint Contact
drivers.description: Contact endpoint device created as a child of Alexa Pack Manager for use as discrete Alexa routine triggers.

drivers.name: Alexa Pack – MultiTrigger Controller
drivers.description: Controller device used in Hubitat automations to trigger numbered endpoints (contact sensors) exposed to Alexa.
